attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How come we never see white dog dirt anymore? I don't believe that it has anything to do with dog food ingredients....it's a government conspiracy. Isn't it a bit coincidental that the PM is called BROWN and all the dog dirt is BROWN??? Think about it. It's time we fought back!

I love the taste of it and demand it's return!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
